mapper.update: update hall set hallCode = #{hallcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hallName = #{hallname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vip = #{vip,jdbcType=BIT}, imax = #{imax,jdbcType=BIT}, coupleHall = #{couplehall,jdbcType=BIT}, specialsJsonString = #{specialsjsonstring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cinemaId = #{cinemaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where hallId = #{hallid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select hallId, hallCode, hallName, vip, imax, coupleHall, specialsJsonString, cinemaId, createTime, updateTime from hall where hallId = #{hallid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select hallId, hallCode, hallName, vip, imax, coupleHall, specialsJsonString, cinemaId, createTime, updateTime from hall
